alert.note: Alert for Adams; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 414 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm south of Hanover, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Hanover, Gettysburg, Parkville, Littlestown, Codorus, McSherrystown, Pennville, Bonneauville, Lake Heritage, Glenville, Two Taverns and Gettysburg National Military Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
